snippet: To the Editor:   Bret Schundler (Op-Ed, Oct. 28) disingenuously supported California's school voucher initiative. The proposition would not have provided enough funds to allow poor children to attend private schools; it would not have regulated sc...
lead_paragraph: To the Editor: Bret Schundler (Op-Ed, Oct. 28) disingenuously supported California's school voucher initiative. The proposition would not have provided enough funds to allow poor children to attend private schools; it would not have regulated schools that any con artist could have established by assembling 25 children in a storefront. Even with entrance to a decent private school, it would not have provided money for transportation.

headline.main: School Voucher Plans Don't Improve Education; Discrimination Built In
